Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1965...
Released by San Francisco on 3/2/1965...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 3/2/1965 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1966, off Bill Graham (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1966, off Joe Bonikowski (MIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1967, hitting .571 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 6/28/1969...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1969, hitting .591 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1969...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1970...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
